page.title: 03The houses we live in
page.content: The houses in the area are situated mainly in the village of Long Lawford; they are mainly terraced and semi-detached.I live in a semi-detached house.Years ago,the four main streets were Chapel Street,Main Street,School Street and Cross Street and the housing was situated along these streets which were formed in the shape of a cross.All the other streets have been added on in recent years,for instance, where an old caravan site used to be now has all new houses on it making new streets called Thomas Way,Round Avenue and Hirst Close. In Main Street, near to the village church, more houses are being built which will lead into Thomas Way.Much of the recent development that has taken place has been for old people and these houses have a warden called Dot who looks after them.
